channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-20035] BlockingShuffleITCase unstable with "Could not start rest endpoint on any port in port range 8081"
item.description:

item.summary: BlockingShuffleITCase unstable with "Could not start rest endpoint on any port in port range 8081"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This failure is caused by port bind exception. I have submitted a PR to use random port for BlockingShuffleITCase and ShuffleCompressionITCase.
Thanks a lot for looking into it. I assigned you to the ticket.
rmetzger I made a mistake in the previous fix and I opened a new fix for it. Sorry for that, could you please take a look? Here is the PR: https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/14149.
rmetzger I reopened this ticket.

No problem!
Resolved in https://github.com/apache/flink/commit/3295879b69f6aababef484983438ffd61b7d6b13.
